diff_act: 2.enable the operator to abort these operations

regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an option for the operator to manually abort automatic launch and recovery operations when necessary.
The TCS shall abort the automatic launch and recovery operations if necessary.
The TCS shall enable the operator to abort automatic launch and recovery operations if conditions necessitate.

label: The TCS shall initiate abort the launch and recovery procedures if required.
absence: action of aborting the launch and recovery procedures
